mcq.statement: Which of the following statements could not be used to describe a species? A group of organisms sharing unique structural and functional characteristics., A group of organism showing distinctly similar autosomes., A group of organism showing analogous body structure., A group of organism capable of mating to produce viable off spring., A group of organisms sharing the same ecological niche.

options.a: A group of organisms sharing unique structural and functional characteristics.
options.b: A group of organism showing distinctly similar autosomes.
options.c: A group of organism showing analogous body structure.
options.d: A group of organism capable of mating to produce viable off spring.
